title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Research Scientist Post
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, and MVSc can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can ...
